title: Amazing Kids Games

games.name: Math Adventure Quest
games.description: Embark on an epic journey solving math puzzles and defeating monsters with the power of numbers!

games.name: Word Wizard Castle
games.description: Cast spelling spells and build vocabulary while exploring a magical castle full of word-based challenges!

games.name: Virtual Science Lab
games.description: Conduct safe experiments and discover the wonders of chemistry, physics, and biology in your own virtual laboratory!

games.name: Code Breaker Academy
games.description: Learn programming fundamentals while solving puzzles and creating your own simple games and animations!

games.name: Geography Explorer
games.description: Travel the world virtually, learn about different countries, cultures, and landmarks in this interactive geography game!
